DOC.brief_summary: In the present study, the effects of 3 weeks of unloading on muscle mass and muscle fiber characteristics will be determined. In addition, the effects of 6 weeks of recovery will be assessed.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Unloading on Muscle Mass
DOC.criteria: Healthy BMI < 30 kg/m2 Use of medication that may affect haemostasis Subjects with (recent) musculoskeletal/orthopaedic disorders known to affect the outcome of the study or that compromise their ability to walk with crutches Subjects with metal implants in their lower limbs Subjects with known cardiovascular and/or haemostasis disorders Subjects with known severe hypertension
